How much will it cost?

Show answer

Single-page site - from $250.

A simple landing website that introduces the user to a product, service, event, etc., and contains a call to action.

Multi-page site (3+ pages) - from $400

Small website for a business, product or service. Usually consists of several pages such as description, shopping cart, and 404 page, etc.

Multi-page online store - from $700

Massive website for business with a large assortment of products. Contains such pages as product description, delivery, payment and return methods, shopping cart.

How long will it take?

Show answer

Single-page site - from 3 days

Multi-page site (3+ pages) - from 7 days

Multi-page online store - from 10 days

Timing may vary depending on the complexity of the elements on the website

What kind of warranty exists?

Show answer

I guarantee that you will receive the project in the form in which it was specified in the brief and technical specifications. All changes and additions will be recorded in writing, so each stage of work can be easily tracked.

If the quality of work won't satisfy?

Show answer

I will work on the project until you are satisfied with the result according to the brief and technical specifications.

What do I charge extra for?

Show answer
  • If you want to receive the project before the agreed deadlines.
  • The scope of work increases after the project is approved.
  • You want to make changes to the project that significantly affect the structure of the site.

What methods of payment are there?

Show answer
  • Paypal
  • Monero
  • ... more to come

Is there a post-development support?

Show answer

Within 2 weeks after the completed project is handed over to the customer, corrections and fixes are made at no additional cost. If you need technical support after 2 weeks, this is possible by individual agreement.
